channel.title: Infinite gluon gun ammo under zoom

item.title: Infinite gluon gun ammo under zoom
item.dc:creator: Ultrandrey
item.description:
• Choose a gluon gun;
  • Hold the left mouse button;
  • Without releasing the left mouse button, enter the binocular mode (zoom - the “z” key);
  • Release the left mouse button;
  • Exit the binocular mode (zoom - the “z” key).

ER
The gluon gun runs out of ammo
AR
The gluon gun doesn’t run out of ammo

Read full topic
item.source: Infinite gluon gun ammo under zoom
